movies.title: Citizen Kane
movies.plot: A wealthy publishing tycoon’s life is traced through the memories of those who knew him.
movies.impact: Revolutionized filmmaking with non-linear storytelling, deep focus, and innovative camera techniques.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.plot: The intersecting lives of criminals and mobsters are told in a darkly comedic, non-linear narrative.
movies.impact: Redefined the crime genre with its sharp dialogue, cultural references, and innovative storytelling.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.plot: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of reality and his role in a war against intelligent machines.
movies.impact: Introduced groundbreaking visual effects (bullet time) and explored deep philosophical themes.

movies.title: Casablanca
movies.plot: A cynical nightclub owner helps his former lover and her husband escape from Nazi-occupied Morocco.
movies.impact: Set a gold standard for romance films, blending timeless themes with iconic performances and lines.

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
movies.plot: A young farmer joins a rebellion to destroy an evil empire’s planet-destroying weapon.
movies.impact: Revolutionized blockbuster filmmaking, pioneering special effects and redefining the sci-fi genre.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.plot: A patriarch of a crime family passes control to his reluctant son amidst a web of betrayal and violence.
movies.impact: Set the standard for crime dramas with its storytelling, cinematography, and character complexity.

movies.title: 2001: A Space Odyssey
movies.plot: A mysterious monolith influences humanity's evolution, culminating in a journey beyond the stars.
movies.impact: Reimagined sci-fi as a serious art form, using stunning visuals and philosophical exploration.

movies.title: Psycho
movies.plot: A secretary’s stay at a remote motel takes a terrifying turn when she encounters its disturbed owner.
movies.impact: Redefined the horror genre with its suspenseful storytelling and shocking twists.

movies.title: Schindler's List
movies.plot: A German industrialist saves the lives of over a thousand Jewish refugees during the Holocaust.
movies.impact: An emotionally profound work that portrayed the Holocaust with stark realism and humanity.

movies.title: Black Panther
movies.plot: T'Challa, the newly crowned king of Wakanda, must defend his nation and its advanced technology from a dangerous adversary.
movies.impact: A cultural milestone in representation, it celebrated African culture while redefining superhero films as tools for deeper storytelling.
